titleStmt.title: Peter Du Moulin. His oration in the praise of divinitie Wherein is shevven that heathenish fables were first derived from holy Scripture. Transl. by J.M.
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
J. M., fl. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] and T. F[awcet] for Hen: Shepheard, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Chancery-lane, at the signe of the Bible
